text: 2.20: Zo 13.1; Ro 6.11; Ga 1.4; Ef 5.2; Ta 2.14; 1 Pi 4.2Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap Krais phorgap, khanarareŋ ga ntorgap rimgi fara muuŋgiap ki. Gu ana phorgap rimgiap, bɨɨŋbɨɨn kama ndigi. Gu mba ndigi bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ, ana nan bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Krais, ana nan vhen kav, ana mba bɨɨŋbɨɨn na nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu ntige kha nuianan mbui tɨvi gum nan ŋaari, nta gu Krais khothɨgap ana zɨn vuav mbui bigi ma. Gu guigira Fhe Bakɨmen Kama khothɨgi, ana guigira won ndavar na nɨɨŋgiap, ana won tuma fekhɨngiap, nan kurigi.
